name: When it rains (BigHug)
description:
It is raining and you can't go outside. You're only option is to play boardgames.

In this game, written in python using pygame, you look around the room to find games to play. There is no purpose, no epic endgoal, just a distraction to pass the time.

When it rains was made by 3 people as a submission to Vetelino's summer jam - august 2022.

All Audio is royalty free and all the art is homemade.

Games:

Chess, Checkers and Peg (try and remove all but one piece from the board)
